mapper.select: select count(*) as count from T_EMPLOYEES where building_id=#{building_id} and date_format(birthday,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')

select b.remark,count(*) num from T_EMPLOYEES a,T_EMPLOYEES_EVENT b where a.employees_id=b.employees_id and b.event_name = #{remark} and a.building_id = #{building_id} and event_time BETWEEN #{begin_time} and #{after_time} GROUP BY b.remark
